Name: Spritz Al Bitter (Spritz Veneziano)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and skewered Fragata Green Olive .
POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.
Briefly STIR so as not to lose fizz.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over cocktail and discard.
Review: Basically, a Spritzer with a generous splash of Italian red bitter liqueur - dry and very refreshing. The perfect aperitivo. In Venice, this is based on the local white wines of the region: Pinot Grigio, Soave, or Prosecco, but as this cocktail has travelled, prosecco has become dominant. However, I prefer, as I first encountered this cocktail, with Pinot Grigio.
